ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: You do more damage to creeps.
ItemTooltips.stout_shield: You take less damage from creeps and hero's
ItemTooltips.tango: This for helping you stay alive while killing medium - large camps.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: A TP scroll eating up your slot? Get these to replace your boots and free up that 1 slot for another big item!
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: Get the gloves of haste ASAP then receipe
ItemTooltips.assault: Gives you nice armor and attack speed for you and your teammates. -5 Armor on enemy and buildings. Sweet
ItemTooltips.heart: Gives you a load of health and a good amount of damage.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Enemy got evasion? Or just want some nice damage,attack speed and a mini bash? This is your man.
ItemTooltips.basher: I would normally go for this first but maelstrom or this first is fine.
ItemTooltips.armlet: This is the item you wanna go after Phase Boots
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: More attackspeed/dmg? This is your man.
ItemTooltips.maelstrom: Go for this or the Skull Basher first, I would go for the Skull Basher first.
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: This gives you a lockdown and some time for you to kill them

AbilityTooltips.life_stealer_rage: Allows you to kill faster and escape when somebody comes and disturbs your farm.
AbilityTooltips.life_stealer_feast: Allows you to get life when you do damage.
AbilityTooltips.life_stealer_open_wounds: Slows down the enemy or gives you a huge health lifesteal back when you're doing damage.
AbilityTooltips.life_stealer_infest: You can enter into a big creep and come out causing him to die and back to full hp!
